page.pageName: Birthday Week 2024 - Updates and Announcements - LIVE

metaTags.metaDescription: This week we'll celebrate our 14th birthday. As has become our tradition, we'll be announcing a series of products that we think of as our gifts back to the Internet. See what has been announced during the week.

relatedBlades.title: Welcome to Birthday Week 2024
relatedBlades.copy: This week marks Cloudflare's 14th birthday, and each day this week we will  announce new things that further our mission — to help build a better Internet.

imageAssetFile.altText: Birthday Week 2024 Hero Illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Birthday Week 2024

features.title: Cloudflare's 2024 Annual Founders' Letter
features.description: This week Cloudflare will celebrate the fourteenth anniversary of our launch. We think of it as our birthday.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - Sunday - Founder's Letter

features.title: Start auditing and controlling the AI models accessing your content
features.description: Cloudflare customers on any plan can now audit and control how AI models access the content on their site.

imageAssetFile.altText: AI Content Scraping

contentfulAsset.description: AI Content Scraping

features.title: Making zone management more efficient with batch DNS record updates
features.description: In response to customer demand, we now support the ability to DELETE, PATCH, PUT and POST multiple DNS records in a single API call, enabling more efficient and reliable zone management.

imageAssetFile.altText: Batched DNS Record Changes performance

contentfulAsset.description: Batched DNS Record Changes performance

features.title: Introducing Ephemeral IDs: a new tool for fraud detection
features.description: As the Internet evolves, Turnstile does too. Introducing Ephemeral IDs — a new dimension in detecting fraudulent activity, bot or human, that links behavior to a specific client instead of an IP address. This makes Turnstile better for everyone, everywhere.

imageAssetFile.altText: Turnstile's Next Evolution: Catch More Than Just Bots

contentfulAsset.description: Turnstile's Next Evolution: Catch More Than Just Bots

features.title: Network performance update: Birthday Week 2024
features.description: Since June 2021 we've been measuring and ranking our network performance against the top global networks in the world. We use this data to improve our performance, and to share the results of those initiatives.

imageAssetFile.altText: Network Performance Update

contentfulAsset.description: Network Performance Update

features.title: Cloudflare partners with Internet Service Providers and network equipment providers to deliver a safer browsing experience to millions of homes
features.description: Cloudflare is extending the use of our public DNS resolver through partnering with ISPs and network providers to deliver a safer browsing experience directly to families. Join us in protecting every Internet user from unsafe content with the click of a button, powered by 1.1.1.1 for Families.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - 'Safer' Resolver/ 1.1.1.1 for devices and ISPs

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - 'Safer' Resolver/ 1.1.1.1 for devices and ISPs

features.title: A safer Internet with Cloudflare: free threat intelligence, analytics, and new threat detections
features.description: Today, we are taking some big steps forward in our mission to help build a better Internet. Cloudflare is giving everyone free access to 10+ different website and network security products and features.

imageAssetFile.altText: Securing more of the Internet with Cloudflare

contentfulAsset.description: Securing more of the Internet with Cloudflare

features.title: Automatically generating Cloudflare's Terraform provider
features.description: The Cloudflare Terraform provider used to be manually maintained. With the help of our existing OpenAPI code generation pipeline, we're now automatically generating the provider for better endpoint and attribute coverage, faster updates when new products are announced and a new API documentation site to top it all off. Read on to see how we pulled it all together.

imageAssetFile.altText: Terraform and new API docs: technical post

contentfulAsset.description: Terraform and new API docs: technical post

features.title: Cloudflare helps verify the security of end-to-end encrypted messages by auditing key transparency for WhatsApp
features.description: Cloudflare is now verifying WhatsApp's Key Transparency audit proofs to ensure the security of end-to-end encrypted messaging conversations without having to manually check QR codes. We are publishing the results of the proof verification to https://dash.key-transparency.cloudflare.com for independent researchers and security experts to compare against WhatsApp's. Cloudflare does not have access to underlying public key material or message metadata as part of this infrastructure.

imageAssetFile.altText: Key Transparency

contentfulAsset.description: Key Transparency

features.title: Speed Brain - Load Pages Instantly
features.description: We are excited to announce the latest leap forward in speed – Speed Brain. Speed Brain uses the Speculation Rules API to prefetch content for the user's likely next navigations. The goal is to download a web page to the browser before a user navigates to it, allowing pages to load instantly.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - Cloudflare Speculation - Load Pages Instantly

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - Cloudflare Speculation - Load Pages Instantly

features.title: Instant Purge: invalidating cached content in under 150ms (part 3 of the Coreless Purge series)
features.description: Today we're excited to share that we've built the fastest cache purge in the industry.  We now offer a global purge latency for purge by tags, hostnames, and prefixes of less than 150ms on average (P50), representing a 90% improvement since May 2022.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - Purging cache just got 9x faster

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - Purging cache just got 9x faster

features.title: New standards for a faster and more private Internet
features.description: Cloudflare's customers can now take advantage of Zstandard (zstd) compression, offering 42% faster compression than Brotli and 11.3% more efficiency than GZIP. We're further optimizing performance for our customers with HTTP/3 prioritization and BBR congestion control, and enhancing privacy through Encrypted Client Hello (ECH).

imageAssetFile.altText: New Standards for Faster Web

contentfulAsset.description: New Standards for Faster Web

features.title: TURN and anycast: making peer connections work globally
features.description: TURN servers help relay media and data between devices when direct peer-to-peer connections are blocked or fail. Cloudflare Calls' TURN server uses anycast to eliminate the need to think about regions or scaling, improving reliability of WebRTC applications.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Calls - TURN Service GA

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare Calls - TURN Service GA

features.title: Cloudflare's 12th Generation servers — 145% more performant and 63% more efficient
features.description: Cloudflare is thrilled to announce the general deployment of our next generation of server — Gen 12 powered by AMD Genoa-X processors. This new generation of server focuses on delivering exceptional performance across all Cloudflare services, enhanced support for AI/ML workloads, significant strides in power efficiency, and improved security features.

imageAssetFile.altText: Gen 12 Metals

contentfulAsset.description: Gen 12 Metals

features.title: Startup Program revamped: build and grow on Cloudflare with up to $250,000 in credits
features.description: Cloudflare's Startup Program now offers up to $250,000 in credits for companies building on our Developer Platform. The program relaunch uses clear and predictable credits so that you can easily see how usage impacts future pricing.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - Revamped Startup Program w/Credits

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - Revamped Startup Program w/Credits

features.title: Cloudflare's Bigger, Better, Faster AI platform
features.description: Whether you want the fastest inference at the edge, optimized AI workflows, or vector database-powered RAG, we're excited to help you harness the full potential of AI and get started on building with Cloudflare.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - Fastest AI Inference + new pricing for AI

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - Fastest AI Inference + new pricing for AI

features.title: Builder Day 2024: 18 big updates to the Workers platform
features.description: To celebrate Builder Day 2024, we're shipping 18 updates inspired by direct feedback from developers building on Cloudflare. This includes new capabilities, like running evals with AI Gateway, beta products like Queues and Vectorize graduating to GA, massive speed improvements to KV and Workers AI, pricing simplifications, and bringing key features from Pages into Workers.

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - Do more with Workers

features.title: We made Workers KV up to 3x faster — here's the data
features.description: Speed is a critical factor that dictates Internet behavior. Every additional millisecond a user spends waiting for your web page to load results in them abandoning your website.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - How we made KV Faster — with data to prove it

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - How we made KV Faster — with data to prove it

features.title: Zero-latency SQLite storage in every Durable Object
features.description: Traditional cloud storage is inherently slow because it is accessed over a network and must synchronize many clients. But what if we could instead put your application code deep into the storage layer, such that your code runs where the data is stored? Durable Objects with SQLite do just that.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - Zero-latency SQL storage in every Durable Object

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - Zero-latency SQL storage in every Durable Object

features.title: Making Workers AI faster and more efficient: Performance optimization with KV cache compression and speculative decoding
features.description: With a new generation of data center accelerator hardware and using optimization techniques such as KV cache compression and speculative decoding, we've made large language model (LLM) inference lightning-fast on the Cloudflare Workers AI platform.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - How we made Workers AI Fast

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - How we made Workers AI Fast

features.title: Expanding Cloudflare's support for open source projects with Project Alexandria
features.description: At Cloudflare, we believe in the power of open source. With Project Alexandria, our expanded open source program, we're helping open source projects have a sustainable and scalable future, providing them with the tools and protection needed to thrive.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - Open Source Credits (formerly Project Hot Sauce)

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - Open Source Credits (formerly Project Hot Sauce)

features.title: Our container platform is in production. It has GPUs. Here's an early look.
features.description: We've been working on something new — a platform for running containers across Cloudflare's network. We already use it in production, for AI inference and more. Today we want to share an early look at how it's built, why we built it, and how we use it ourselves.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - Containers

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - Containers

features.title: Advancing cybersecurity: Cloudflare implements a new bug bounty VIP program as part of CISA Pledge commitment
features.description: Cloudflare strengthens its commitment to cybersecurity by joining CISA's "Secure by Design" pledge. In line with this commitment, we're enhancing our vulnerability disclosure policy by launching a VIP bug bounty program, giving top researchers early access to our products. Keep an eye out for future updates regarding Cloudflare's CISA pledge as we work together to shape a safer digital future.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - CISA Secure by Design Pledge

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - CISA Secure by Design Pledge

features.title: Empowering builders: introducing the Dev Alliance and Workers Launchpad Cohort #4
features.description: Empowering developers with the Dev Starter Pack and Workers Cohort #4: get free or discounted access to essential developer tools and meet the latest set of incredible startups building on Cloudflare.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - TBC: Workers Launchpad #4 + Launchpad Demo Day + Developer Alliance Starter Pack

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - TBC: Workers Launchpad #4 + Launchpad Demo Day + Developer Alliance Starter Pack

features.title: Network trends and natural language: Cloudflare Radar's new Data Explorer & AI Assistant
features.description: The Cloudflare Radar Data Explorer provides a simple Web-based interface to build more complex API queries, including comparisons and filters, and visualize the results. The accompanying AI Assistant translates a user's natural language statements or questions into the appropriate Radar API calls.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - Cloudflare Radar Data Explorer

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - Cloudflare Radar Data Explorer

features.title: AI Everywhere with the WAF Rule Builder Assistant, Cloudflare Radar AI Insights, and updated AI bot protection
features.description: This year for Cloudflare's birthday, we've extended our AI Assistant capabilities to help you build new WAF rules, added new AI bot & crawler traffic insights to Radar, and given customers new AI bot blocking capabilities.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - Bringing AI features into Cloudflare

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - Bringing AI features into Cloudflare

features.title: Reaffirming our commitment to free
features.description: Today Cloudflare reaffirms its commitment to offering a robust Free service tier that continues to improve. We share why Free is a cornerstone of our business strategy, and how it contributes to building a better Internet.

imageAssetFile.altText: BirthdayWk24 - Cloudflare Reaffirms its Commitment to Free Always Being Free

contentfulAsset.description: BirthdayWk24 - Cloudflare Reaffirms its Commitment to Free Always Being Free

features.title: Wrapping up another Birthday Week celebration
features.description: Recapping all the big announcements made during 2024's Birthday Week.

imageAssetFile.altText: Birthday Week 2024 Wrap Up

contentfulAsset.description: Birthday Week 2024 Wrap Up
